section.name: HST Howto
section.span: Learn how to build a website using Hippo Site Toolkit.
section.p: This Howto guide uses a hands-on approach to let you learn how to build a website using Hippo Site Toolkit step by step. It describes a number of small tasks that you will need to perform while building your website. You can either follow them all in chronological order, or go directly to the task you want to learn about.
If you do not know where to start, start with Start a project.

tr.td: Learn how to create a new document type, and how to use it in your website, by adding a simple facebook to the sample website: Create a document type, Add people, Create a people module, Configure the sitemap, Create a person module, Configure the sitemap, Browse your facebook!.
Adding a form to a web page, and processing the submitted form: The module class, The module view, Configure and test your module.
How to add free meta search functionality to a website so that the user can perform searches within meta data on all documents?: First subsection title, Second subsection title.
Add text search functionality to a website: Search form module, Search results module, Search results page, Search!.
Adding a simple page to your website saying hello to the world: Add the document, View the document on the website, Under the hood.
Setting up a new project with Hippo Site Toolkit 2 using a Maven archetype: Creating your project, Deploying your project in Tomcat, Running your project with Jetty.

section.subsection: If you are looking for detailed information on a specific component of Hippo Site Toolkit, see the reference guide.
